üìù Learn from online videos
Take timestamped notes, screenshots and transcripts (YouTube only) from videos on large number of online platforms to elevate your productivity and enhance your knowledge retention.
Now, you can just highlight the transcripts to generate video segments and create a video summary or slideshow from your clips.

üîé Analyse and review videos
Analyse own videos for skill improvement, or provide specific and actionable feedback, or share important moments with the team members. Keep the conversations on videos private, contextual and reference-able

üìå Tag, search, color code and organise
